All Classes

  • All Classes Interface Summary Class Summary Enum Summary 
    Class Description
    ActionInterface
    This interface provides the ability to add methods to Action, without modifying code in the engine, or downcasting references in the game.
    ActorInterface
    This interface provides the ability to add methods to Actor, without modifying code in the engine, or downcasting references in the game.
    Application
    The main class for the zombie apocalypse game.
    AttackAction
    Special Action for attacking other Actors.
    AttackBehaviour
    A class that generates an AttackAction if the current Actor is standing next to an Actor that they can attack.
    Behaviour
    A factory for creating actions.
    Corpse
    A corpse item which is portable and created when an actor is dead.
    CraftingAction
    Special Action that allows actor to craft a weapon
    Crop
    A crop that ripes over time, can be sowed, fertilized when it is unripe and harvested when it is ripe.
    Dirt
    A class that represents bare dirt.
    EatAction
    Special Action that allows Actor to eat and recover health points.
    EatBehaviour
    A class that generates an EatAction if the current Actor is damaged and standing on a Food.
    Farmer
    Class representing a farmer which is a kind of human and also can sow, fertilize and harvest.
    Fence
    An impenetrable barrier.
    FertilizeAction
    Special Action for fertilizing an unripe Crop to decrease the time left to ripe.
    FertilizeBehaviour
    A class that generates a FertilizeAction if the current Actor is standing on an unripe Crop to fertilize it.
    FollowBehaviour
    A class that figures out a MoveAction that will move the actor one step closer to a target Actor.
    Food
    A food item which is portable and can be eaten.
    GroundCapability
    An enum representing a collection of constants which indicate the capabilities of a Ground.
    GroundInterface
    This interface provides the ability to add methods to Ground, without modifying code in the engine, or downcasting references in the game.
    HarvestAction
    Special Action that allows Actor to harvest a ripe crop for food.
    HarvestBehaviour
    A class that generates a HarvestAction if the current Actor is standing on or next to a ripe Crop.
    Human
    Class representing an ordinary human.
    HuntBehaviour
    Returns a MoveAction that will take the Actor closer to the nearest instance of a target class.
    ItemCapability
    An enum representing a collection of constants which indicate the capabilities of an Item.
    ItemInterface
    This interface provides the ability to add methods to Ground, without modifying code in the engine, or downcasting references in the game.
    LimbsCapability
    An enum representing a collection of constants which indicate the capabilities of a Limb.
    PickUpWeaponBehaviour
    A class that generates a PickUpItemAction if the current Actor is standing on a location that has a weapon.
    Plank
    A primitive weapon.
    Player
    Class representing the Player.
    PortableItem
    Base class for any item that can be picked up and dropped.
    SimpleClub
    A type of Weapon Item that only appears when a Zombie dropped its limb
    SowAction
    Special Action for sowing a Crop.
    SowBehaviour
    A class that generates an SowAction if the current Actor is standing beside a Dirt to sow a crop on it.
    Tree
    A tree that starts as a sapling and grows into a large tree.
    WanderBehaviour
    Allows an Actor to wander around at random.
    Zombie
    A Zombie.
    ZombieActor
    Base class for Actors in the Zombie World
    ZombieAttackAction
    Special Action that allows only Zombie to attack
    ZombieCapability
    An enum representing a collection of constants which indicate the capabilities of an Actor.
    ZombieClub
    A weapon item that is crafted by an actor from a zombie arm
    ZombieMace
    A weapon item that is crafted by an actor from a zombie leg
